DOC.brief_summary: The research question `` Are different type house Ho Chi Minh city equally contribute chronic respiratory disease ? '' . According question , cross-sectional explorative study set explore difference environmental characteristic prevalence chronic respiratory disease among common housing type Ho Chi Minh city . Preliminary work perform 100 house ( 20 house per type , include tube house , rental house , rural house , slum apartment ) November 2013 June 2015 . It include measure environmental device , questionnaire indoor activity diary . This study aim collect information prevalence chronic respiratory disease ( CRDs ) inside house type understand role house type develop CRDs . The objective : 1. evaluate relationship type house lung function inhabitant housing type . 2. evaluate effect environmental risk factor house type prevalence CRDs
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Relationship Between Environmental Risk Factors Housing Types Chronic Respiratory Diseases Ho Chi Minh City
DOC.criteria: Everybody Not able answer questionnaire give inform consent Have contraindication lung function test ( acute myocardial infarction less 1 month ago , pain related spirometry , dementia/confused )
